product_name: Prego Italian Tomato Pasta Sauce Flavored With Meat, 24 OZ Jar
description: Be the hero at dinner with Prego Tomato Pasta Sauce Flavored With Meat. Versatile and delicious, this classic red sauce features the rich, sweet taste of vine-ripened tomatoes balanced with flavorful meat, herbs and seasonings. Prego spaghetti sauce has a taste everyone loves and a thick texture that doesn’t water out, making it a perfect pairing with any pasta. This Prego sauce is gluten free and made almost entirely of vegetables for a spaghetti sauce you can feel good about. Each half cup serving of this pasta sauce provides 40 percent of your daily vegetables, giving you a sauce that’s as nutritious as it is tasty. Top off any pasta with this Prego meat sauce for a quick, family-pleasing meal, or use it as a base for your favorite recipes. The tomato sauce jar top is easy to close and store in the refrigerator for leftovers. Give your family the taste everyone loves with Prego. In addition to Italian Tomato Sauce Flavored With Meat, Prego offers a variety of other crowd-pleasing favorites, including Chunky Tomato, Garlic and Onion Italian Sauce, Mushroom and Green Pepper Sauce and more!
latest_reviews: Taste great! Delivered quickly. Great price.
Love prego, it's not runny like other brands and that's what I like best
So easy, simple & tasty. Pairs well with any pasta dish. Easy to customize to your tastes. Jar is durable & fun to repurpose in craft projects. Recyclable too. Great value.
